Description:
Sales Strategy: Develop and execute strategic sales plans to achieve revenue targets for our training courses, focusing on both individual participants and corporate clients.
Course Promotion: Promote and market our training courses through various channels, including social media platforms, email campaigns, outdoor events, and other marketing initiatives.
Lead Generation: Identify and generate potential leads through research, networking, cold calling, and referrals to build a strong sales pipeline.
Consultative Selling: Conduct thorough needs assessments to understand potential clients' training requirements and tailor course offerings to meet their specific needs.
Sales Presentations: Deliver compelling sales presentations to individuals and corporate decision-makers, showcasing the benefits and value of our training courses.
Relationship Building: Cultivate and maintain strong relationships with existing clients and develop new partnerships to drive repeat business and referrals.Skills
Skills:
Training/Course Sales Experience: Demonstrated track record of success in selling training programs, courses, or educational services to individuals and corporate clients.
Social Media Experience: Proficiency in using social media platforms (e.g., LinkedIn, Twitter, Facebook) for lead generation, promotion, and building a professional network.
Outdoor Sales Experience: Proven experience in conducting face-to-face sales activities, such as attending industry events, trade shows, and client meetings.
Online Sales Experience: Familiarity with online sales techniques, including webinars, virtual demos, and email marketing.
Sales Expertise: Strong sales and negotiation skills with the ability to close deals and meet or exceed sales targets.
Relationship Management: Excellent interpersonal skills with the ability to build and maintain strong relationships with clients.
For Kuwaiti Nationals.
